mods.abstract: Typed order letter from the Wrestling office requesting 100 1-color window cards for the World's Greatest NWA Wrestling at the New National Guard Armory across from Fort Campbell in Clarksville, TN on Monday, June 19, 1978. Event includes Dutch Mantell Champion vs. Gypsy Joe Challenger, Wild Tag Battle George Gulas and Bobby Eaton vs. The Viking and the Beast, Jerry Barber vs Whipper Watson, Evil Hutto vs. Shawney Bo Wynn. Promotor is Nick Gulas.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
